about_the_game:
This DLC pack will include cute pajama sets, loungewear, bodysuits and cutout loungewear. Provide players with more home clothing choices to create a fantastic home life.
Through this DLC, players will get a series of high-quality home clothing, whether it is home casual clothes for watching movies on the sofa, or wearing bodysuits for fitness, which will make the player's character more refined and charming. The hollow home slim underwear and cute pajamas set pay more attention to the sexiness and cuteness of the character, making the player's character more confident and eye-catching.
In short, the DLC package "3D LOVER - ONE NIGHT" will bring players a more perfect home life experience, allowing them to experience the fun of taking care of their own home in the game, and at the same time show their own charm and temperament. Whether relaxing at home or going out to play, this DLC will bring players a better gaming experience.

name: 3D LOVER - ONE NIGHT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This DLC pack will include cute pajama sets, loungewear, bodysuits and cutout loungewear. Provide players with more home clothing choices to create a fantastic home life.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
